cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper DRB encryption setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value will cause security configuration errors and prevent proper DRB encryption setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 drb_ciphering 設定為無效值會導致安全配置錯誤，並阻止正確的 DRB 加密設置。
